reviews.review: best fps game in the world
Bom, vamos lá : O jogo é uma lástima, totalmente abandonado, não possui anti cheat, totalmente voltado ao lucro, atualizações iguais todo mês, bug de fps em diversos servidores.

Fajna gierka, ale gdyby nie było ruskich dzieci drących pizde na każdym kroku to byłoby lepiej, i jeszcze ci cheaterzy co strzelają przez ściany, ale tak to gicior

Matchmaking seems really bad compared to the few other competitive games I have played. The ranking system, smurfing and cheaters really ruin the experience, can't enjoy the game casually because of the amount of toxic, tryhard or just far better players you get matched against. Toxicity seems to be embraced by CS:GO whereas in other games many of these behaviours would be straight up banned automatically. Just an overall shitty experience for my taste, no way I would ever start this game without friends nagging me to play it.
